title:
ARTICLE # 18: [DO YOU KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON UNDER YOUR NOSE THROUGH OUT YOUR LIFE? ]

attachments.displayName:
ARTICLE # 18: [DO YOU KNOW WHAT IS GOING ON UNDER YOUR NOSE THROUGH OUT YOUR LIFE? ]
Ayurveda revels the facts on breathing science………………………it is amazing!!!

>>BREATHING SCIENCE IN YOUR BODY
When you breathe…only one of your norstil works and second one is blocked! Yes this happens throught your life….this is all going under your nose? Our breathing is governed by Sun and Moon.

>>KIND OF BREATHING:
When right nostril is active….means you breathe out and breathe in from right nostril ….it is by Pingla Swara and when left Swara is active….it is IDA Swara. ‘Swara’…. means active nostril

>>PERIOD OF BREATHING IN 24 HOURS:
There are 24 periods of breathing in 24 hours. The swara (Breathing) synccronizes with sun rise….2.5 Ghadi (ancient time unit of India) alternating breathing from left and right nostril automically by our body.Total breathing  periods 24…..in 24 hours from  left and right side nostril.12 breathing period from right norstil and 12 from left nostril. In the ailing condition of our body…… the breathing is irregular…no fixed pattern.

In every 30 minute(average) nostril is changed alternatively automatically…..but you can change your nostril activation by blocking one nostril by cotton ball putting in your nose or by laying down on bed. When you lying left….your right nostril will be activativated and vie versa. IDA means right side nostril breathing and PINGLA Swara means left side nostril breathing.
IDA is governed by MOON…. PINGLA is governed by SUN. When breathing is in and out from right nostril ….it is Pingla Swara…..and when breathing is in and out from left nostril… it is Ida swara. And when breathing is from both nostril in same magnitude or alternating breathing i.e. left…right…left…right and so on.This kind of breathing is called SUSHUMNASWARA.

Thanks and best regards with best wishes for over all good health and condition…trusting to have been of services to you I remain…..
Sincerely Yours,
Madan M Pandey (Ayurveda activist, freelance herbalist and research scholar on fundamentals of Ayurveda and rare remedies)

When you breathe…only one of your norstil works and second one is blocked! Yes this happens throught your life….this is all going under your nose? Our breathing is governed by Sun and Moon.

>>PERIOD OF BREATHING IN 24 HOURS:
There are 24 periods of breathing in 24 hours. The swara (Breathing) synccronizes with sun rise….2.5 Ghadi (ancient time unit of India) alternating breathing from left and right nostril automically by our body.Total breathing  periods 24…..in 24 hours from  left and right side nostril.12 breathing period from right norstil and 12 from left nostril. When you lying left….your right nostril will be activativated and vie versa. IDA means right side nostril breathing and PINGLA Swara means left side nostril breathing.
IDA is governed by MOON…. PINGLA is governed by SUN. When breathing is in and out from right nostril ….it is Pingla Swara…..and when breathing is in and out from left nostril… it is Ida swara. And when breathing is from both nostril in same magnitude or alternating breathing i.e. left…right…left…right and so on.This kind of breathing is called SUSHUMNASWARA.
